category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

title: Your Love Is Like No Other

content.text:
God, Your love is like no other.

You are good when you give,
and you are good when you take away.
You're with me when things are bright,
and when everything feels dark.

You loved me before the world even began,
and out of that love, you saved me.
You still love me now,
even with my guarded heart, my thanklessness, and my doubts.

Your goodness has been with me all this past year,
guiding me through confusing and messy times.
You helped me move forward even when I felt like I was falling back,
and when I was knocked down, you made sure I was still making progress.

I know you'll be with me in the year to come.
So, I'm ready to set sail,
with you as the guide for my future, just like you've been for my past.

Thank you for not showing me everything that's up ahead.
If you have tough times planned for me,
I know you'll be right there in the middle of them with me.
If I have to go through intense pressure and temptation,
I know I won't be overcome.

If it's my time to go,
I'll get to see you sooner.
If things are going to end in a painful way,
give me the strength to keep my faith from shaking.
If I have to step away from the work I love,
I won't demand anything from you.

Just let your greatness be seen in my life, whether things are easy or hard,
so I can always be someone you can use.
